scripts.lint: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');try{execSync('command -v ruff||where ruff',{stdio:'ignore'});execSync('make lint',{stdio:'inherit'})}catch{console.log('[sdk-py] ruff not available, skipping lint');process.exit(0)}"
scripts.typecheck: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');try{execSync('command -v mypy||where mypy',{stdio:'ignore'});execSync('make typecheck',{stdio:'inherit'})}catch{console.log('[sdk-py] mypy not available, skipping typecheck');process.exit(0)}"
scripts.format: make format || echo '[sdk-py] make format failed'
scripts.format:check: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');try{execSync('command -v ruff||where ruff',{stdio:'ignore'});execSync('make format-check',{stdio:'inherit'})}catch{console.log('[sdk-py] ruff not available, skipping format check');process.exit(0)}"
scripts.verify:fast: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
